name: Export Data Dictionary Changes
description: Export recent changes of a REDCap Data Dictionary through automated Downloads or Emails.

authors.name: Ekin Tertemiz
authors.institution: Swiss Tropical and Public Health Institute (STPH)

project-settings.name:
Note: Export types and Approval modes
Different export types can be configured independently for different modes of approval.

Automatic Approval Changes are not critical and are beeing approved automatically.
Manual Approval Changes are critical and have to be approved manually by users with higher permissions.

Downloads
Enable Downloads after approval?
A download of a CSV will start after approval, if Data Dictionary Export was requested during submission

Emails
Enable Emails after approval?
An email will be sent to the submission author containing the attached CSV, if Data Dictionary Export was request during submission

Custom Column Separator
Use a custom string to separate columns inside Change History Column. Default is End of Line
